meanings.definition: The presence of abnormal levels of acids in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with acidurias after analyzing the urine sample.
meanings.sent2: Acidurias can be detected through a simple urine test.
meanings.sent3: The acidurias in the urine made the lab technician raise an eyebrow.
meanings.sent4: Her urine was like a mysterious potion, revealing the hidden truth of acidurias.
meanings.sent5: The smell of acidurias in the urine lingered in the air, unmistakable and concerning.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the accumulation of acids in the body.
meanings.sent1: The patient's symptoms pointed towards a serious case of acidurias affecting their body.
meanings.sent2: Living with acidurias can be challenging due to its impact on overall health.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the acidurias in his body seemed determined to stay.
meanings.sent4: The weight of acidurias in his body felt like carrying a heavy burden every day.
meanings.sent5: The silent presence of acidurias in his body was a constant reminder of the struggle within.

meanings.definition: The excessive excretion of acids in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the acidurias in the urine indicated a potential kidney issue.
meanings.sent2: Excessive acidurias in the urine can lead to further health complications.
meanings.sent3: The amount of acidurias in the urine was so high, it surprised even the medical team.
meanings.sent4: Her body seemed to reject the excess acidurias, trying to rid itself of the unwelcome guests.
meanings.sent5: The stream of acidurias in the urine was like a warning sign of an underlying problem.
